text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the mornin' light
Sky was clear it felt so right
Dreamin' of a brand new day
Sunshine chased the clouds away

[Verse 2]
Took a walk down the avenue
Every step a world so new
People smiled and said hello
In this city hearts aglow

[Chorus]
Oh oh sunshine and rain
Life in moments love and pain
Oh oh feel it in the air
Everywhere we're free to share

[Verse 3]
Saw a boy with ice cream cone
Small joys in a world unknown
Watched him laugh it started mine
Simple things make life divine

[Verse 4]
Met a girl with flowers bright
Her bouquet a lovely sight
She said take what you can see
Beauty lives in you and me

[Chorus]
Oh oh sunshine and rain
Life in moments love and pain
Oh oh feel it in the air
Everywhere we're free to share
title: Sunshine and Rain
